HOME.TITLE: Intelligent Trading Platform
HOME.SUBTITLE: Detect market opportunities with custom scanners and advanced filters. Make informed decisions with real-time data.
HOME.FEATURES_SUBTITLE: Professional tools designed for traders seeking efficiency and precision
HOME.STEP1_DESC: Configure a new scanner by defining the name, target market and operating hours.
HOME.STEP2_DESC: Select and configure the filters you want to apply: price, volume, technical indicators and more.
HOME.STEP3_DESC: Receive alerts when opportunities that meet your configured criteria are detected.
HOME.STEP4_DESC: Analyze generated signals and make informed trading decisions based on real data.
HOME.CTA_DESC: Start using our platform and discover opportunities that previously went unnoticed.
HOME.FEATURE1_DESC: Create and manage custom scanners to identify trading opportunities in real time. Configure advanced filters based on technical indicators, volume, price and more.
HOME.FEATURE2_DESC: Use sophisticated conditional filters with multiple parameters. Combine technical and fundamental criteria to find exactly what you're looking for in the markets.
HOME.FEATURE3_DESC: Receive instant notifications when your scanners detect trading signals. Stay informed without needing to constantly monitor the markets.
HOME.FEATURE4_DESC: Access the latest financial news and market events. Stay updated with relevant information that may impact your trading decisions.
HOME.FEATURE5_DESC: Organize your active and archived scanners. Review the history of signals, detected assets and activity logs for each scanner.
HOME.FEATURE6_DESC: Customize each scanner according to your needs. Adjust parameters, select markets, define operating hours and much more.
